body_html:
Your frustration is quite understandable! We are indeed blocking you, and I apologize -- hopefully this doesn't discourage you from continuing to contribute! I'm really impressed with the language bindings we're seeing from the community, and I wish we were able to keep up better.

Instead of re-implementing the work we've done and are doing, would you be willing to help us with the C/++ implementations instead? (This is what I suggested to @eaplatanios as well, who's working on the Scala API.) You mentioned that TF_AddGradients is insufficient, so maybe this is something you could work on in the C++ API? Or something else. I'd be happy to help you get started with C API development, let me know if this works for you and we can talk more about concrete tasks/next steps.

Also regardless of whether you wanna fix it, what were your issues with TF_AddGradients?
